case_title: United States of America v. Carasco et al

charges.charge_description: 21:846 Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute cocaine and crack-cocaine(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for a total term of 100 months, dft is granted credit for time served in federal custody from the date of arrest 4/28/03 w/4 years supervised release to follow.

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 108 months with 3 years supervised release to follow. Sentenced reduced to 87 months custody (10/3/2008).
